article_text:
Photo: Getty Images

Dreaming of retirement? Don’t give notice just yet—you’re probably going to have to work longer to be able to afford it.

Don’t want to work longer? Then boost your savings—maybe by a lot.

article_metadata.sailthru.author: Marlene Y. Satter
article_metadata.description: Most workers will have to work longer to maintain their current standard of living in retirement, an Aon Hewitt study shows.

og.title: Save more? Or work longer?
